events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund since I do not want to keep the product.
The reported issue about receiving an incorrect product has been categorized under the Refund cluster for further handling.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who specializes in refund processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund more efficiently?
Here is my order number 12345 and I have attached photos showing the wrong product compared to what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid shipping label to return the wrong item.
That sounds great, thank you. I appreciate the quick resolution and will send the item back as soon as I receive the return label.
The refund has been processed and the shipping label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to confirm that you received your refund and that the return process went smoothly.
As your refund was successfully completed and we have not received any further concerns, this case will now be closed.
